¿Sabías que antes de las bolsitas de té se preparaban con un aparato llamado infusor?
text:
Before tea bags: # Niñonautas with Kirén Miret | Video
 by AN / OC Writing



Did you know that before tea bags were prepared with a device called an infuser?
